quotes.author: Dave Cheney
quotes.text: If software cannot be maintained, then it will be rewritten

quotes.author: Robert C. Martin
quotes.text: Functions should do one thing. They should do it well. They should do it only

quotes.author: Alan Perlis
quotes.text: There are two ways to write error-free programs; only the third one works

quotes.author: Alan Turing
quotes.text: Codes are a puzzle. A game, just like any other game

quotes.author: Unknown
quotes.text: Weeks of programming can save you hours of planning

quotes.author: Erik Naggum
quotes.text: Languages shape the way we think, or don't
